result.trip_overview_narrative: The British School Manila offers a residential and outdoor education programme central to student learning, focusing on personal challenge, well-being, and community service. Senior School students from Year 7 to 10 participate in week-long residential trips during Activities Week that are physically demanding and include service learning.

evidence.quote: From Year 7 to 10 students participate in Activities Week, choosing from an extensive range of week-long residential trips, which are physically demanding and allow our students to get hands-on with community service.

The British School Manilaâ€™s residential and outdoor education programme is central to the learning experience of our students. It provides them with personal challenge and develops their well-being by helping them grow as individuals.

unknowns: Other trip programs beyond Activities Week
